text: Scholengemeenschap Bonaire (SGB) is a secondary school in Bonaire with multiple campuses in the capital Kralendijk; one for Liseo Boneriano Bovenbouw, and another for Liseo Boneriano Onderbouw, VMBO Vakcollege, and SLP - Pro."Contact." Scholengemeenschap Bonaire. Retrieved on 28 February 2018. Scholengemeenschap Bonaire serves as Bonaire's secondary school, for ages 12–18."Enseñansa avansá." Government of Bonaire. Retrieved on February 27, 2018. "Scholengemeenschap Bonaire Kaya Frater Odulfinus z/n" It is a Dutch- medium school. it has over 1,500 students including those of Dutch Caribbean, European Dutch, and other origins.Home. Scholengemeenschap Bonaire. Retrieved on 28 February 2018. "Scholengemeenschap Bonaire (SGB) is een brede scholengemeenschap met ruim 1500 leerlingen en studenten.[...]De instructietaal op school is Nederlands. " ==References== ==External links== * Scholengemeenschap Bonaire Category:Secondary schools in the Dutch Caribbean Category:Education in Bonaire Category:Buildings and structures in Kralendijk
title: Scholengemeenschap Bonaire
